articles.content: India stood at 41 position out of 44 countries in 2022 with marginal improvement in its index value compared to 40th position out of 43 countries assessed on the Global Pension Index in 2021, shows t… [+2033 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Backhouse
articles.title: ‘Annihilated’: Mass resignations rock China - news.com.au
articles.description: China’s semiconductor industry has been rocked by the mass resignation of American workers after new restrictions were announced by US President Joe Biden’s administration.
articles.content:

articles.title: Suzlon Energy stock gains on bagging order from Adani Green Energy - Moneycontrol
articles.description: This order is a repeat order from Adani Green Energy Ltd. and is in addition to the existing order of 226.8 MW as announced on 13th August 2021, the company said in a regulatory filing.
